content: Children who are 3 years old and younger can enter for free. Children under the age of 13 must be accompanied by adults.
“Youth price” applies to junior high school students and high school students.
This ticket can only be used at TeamLab Planets located in Toyosu and cannot be used at other TeamLab venues. Please pay attention to the correct venue.
Re-entry is not permitted. Please note that your ticket cannot be refunded once you have entered the venue.
For inquiries, please contact the website where you purchased the ticket or your travel agent.
